title: Seafood and spinach risotto
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '455g Arborio (risotto) rice', '1 litre boiling vegetable stock', '2 teaspoons finely chopped garlic', '1 medium leek, chopped', '1 fresh red chilli, chopped', '450g medium prawns, peeled and deveined', '225g small scallops', '400g fresh spinach leaves', '1/2 red pepper, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
